Developer Terms of Use
des:
To use the Comelit Home skill, you must:
- have installed the Comelit home automation system, including a Comelit Hub device (art.20003150), or have installed the 2-wire Mini WiFi monitor.
make sure the products have been installed, connected to the Internet and configured correctly
- make sure you have linked your Comelit account and your Amazon account (for further information please visit www.comelitgroup.com).

Commands linked to products:
- Lights (only with Comelit Hub)
"Alexa, turn on the bedside lamp"
"Alexa, turn off the bedside lamp"
"Alexa, set the living room lamp to 50%”
"Alexa, set the Room LED strip to Red”
...

- Video entry
(with Comelit Hub: lock-release, actuator control, doorbell rung alert)
(with 2-wire Mini WiFi: lock-release, actuator control, doorbell rung alert, indication of the name of the user who rang the doorbell using face recognition)
"Alexa, unlock the front door"
"Alexa, unlock the gate”

- Sprinklers (only with Comelit Hub)
"Alexa, turn on the south garden sprinkler"
"Alexa, turn off the south garden sprinkler"

- Automations (only with Comelit Hub)
"Alexa, turn on the front gate"
"Alexa, turn off the front gate"

- Other (only with Comelit Hub)
"Alexa, turn on the south garden sprinkler"
"Alexa, turn off the south garden sprinkler"

- Thermostats and Sensors (only with Comelit Hub)
“Alexa, increase the temperature to 23 degrees in the basement”
"Alexa, set the Bedroom to 22 degrees"
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the Bedroom?"
"Alexa, what is the Living Room set to?"
"Alexa, set the Bedroom to 25 degrees"
"Alexa, set the Living Room to heating mode"
...

- Scenarios (only with Comelit Hub)
"Alexa, turn on party"
....
